content: **crocheted and felted drops easter basket in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurement** before felting hight 8 cm \ 3 1 diameter 15 cm \ 5 9 after felting hight 5 cm \ 2 diameter 12 cm \ 4 75 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 50 g colour no 01 off white and use 50 g colour no 24 yellow or 50 g colour no 35 lime or 50 g colour no 30 pink drops crochet hook size 8 mm \ l/11 or size needed to obtain 9 single_crochet x 10 row on 4 x 4 crochet info substitute first single_crochet on row by 1 chain every row ends with 1 slip_stitch in first single_crochet uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3639&cid=19
